title: After i patched my ping started spiking, only my pc in lol, other games work fine
body:
I play various online games, including path of exile and cs go, no lag there


After the latest patch i've been having rediculous lag spikes. generally sitting around 300 sometimes reaching upwards of 9000

This game has become unplayable and broken, and its also lagging Kappa

in addition my roommate is have zero issues in his game, his computer is lower spec than mine

*Edit*

we're not trying to play at the same time.

replies.body:
BUT IS IT OVER NINE THOUSAND?!?!?!?!

All jokes aside, it sounds like your network is having a hard time keeping a stable connection to our game servers. If your network has a hard time talking to our servers, it can cause your ping to hang at a really high number even if your roommates pc is able to connect just fine. 

Go through each step our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if we can get that connection patched up.

WHAT 9000?!?!

Checked it out, i've been able to play on my old lappytop, maybe it's some malware my AV isn't picking up. Or its some weird
